Dear Parent_B,

Thank you for your message. Under our allocation rules, our priority ordering is fixed, so additional documents or information generally won’t change a family’s position in the queue.

At the moment, we are keeping the remaining place available while we see whether any higher-priority families apply and complete enrollment. If those families do not take the place (or do not finalize), we would then move to the next family in our priority order and could reconsider your application at that time.

If you would like to remain under consideration, please feel free to message us again with an [APPLY] in a later round—your responsiveness and ability to complete paperwork quickly is helpful if a place becomes available.

Kind regards,
Nursery_C Admissions
